---
title: "lm_function"
output: html_document
date: "2023-11-14"
---
```{r}
lm_function <- funtion(df, dep, indep){
  df %>% 
  if(any(is.numeric({{dep}}))) {
    return_summary <- df %>% 
      selct(a = quo_name(dep), starts_with(indep)) %>% 
      lm(a ~ ., data = .) %>% 
      summary()
    return(return_summary)
  }
  
  
}



```
